tours.name: 16 Day Annual Hawaiian Islands NCL Cruise Tour ~ March 21 – April 5, 2019
tours.summary:
Are you ready for hockey's greatest rivalry?


Always wanted to watch the Habs and Leafs do battle at the beautiful, state-of-the-art Bell Centre? Now you can! Join Collins Tours for a once in a lifetime tour to Montreal to watch the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs take on the hometown Canadiens. This is the final game of the season for both teams and could have playoff implications! This game will be the featured game on Hockey Night in Canada and is sure to be full of excitement.
tours.summaryy: -2N in Montreal, QC at the conveniently located Sheraton Montreal Centre -Return Trip via Motorcoach-2 Buffet Breakfasts included -Hotel Baggage Handling fees (1 Bag per person) -Services of an experienced Tour Director -OPTIONAL - Bell Centre Guided Tour ($30 per guest, extra charge**)

tours.name: 19 Day Panama Canal Cruise Tour - March 29 ~ April 16, 2019
tours.summary:
Free Shipboard Gratuities Included +
Free Ultimate Beverage Package OR Free Specialty Dining Package

Embark on what savvy world travelers consider the thrill of a lifetime— cruising ocean to ocean via the Panama Canal!Join us as we embark on the brand new Norwegian Bliss, to gently fit through the famed series of locks that changed the course of history with a marvel of modern engineering.Our guests enjoy flights included to Miami,returning from Los Angeles, plus overnight stays in both iconic American cities complementing your cruise with the ease of an escorted tour.Our guests may chart their own course for pleasure and pampering the entire way, taking advantage of attentive on board service, spacious staterooms, and excellent award - winning cuisine.Explore Cartagena, Colombia, and immerse yourself in a rainforest paradise in Puntarenas, Costa Rica, where the complex ecosystem supports an overwhelming variety of life.

You will also visit several exotic ports of call along the Mexican Riviera, including Puerto Vallarta, Puerto Chiapas, Puerto Quetzal and Manzanillo.Throughout your cruise, enjoy a variety of unrivaled entertainment aboard the Norwegian Bliss.Choose a Balcony stateroom and see the inner workings of the century - old locks and lake system that make up this modern day marvel of engineering and the“ World’ s Greatest Shortcut!”

'Ready when you are, this exclusive escorted Cruise Tour includes the personal touch of an experienced tour guide with you every step of the way.'

CLICK HERE TO VIEW TENTATIVE ITINERARY
tours.summaryy:
• -Airfare from the Maritimes to Miami, returning from Los Angeles to the Maritimes

  • -3 Nights Deluxe Accommodations, Including:
  • -1N (pre-cruise) at the Courtyard Marriott in Miami, FL
  • -2N (post-cruise) at the Marina Del Ray in Los Angeles, CA

  • -15 night Westbound Panama Canal Cruise Sailing aboard the new Norwegian Bliss!
  • -3 cocktail receptions (including 1 Welcome Reception in Miami, FL, & 2 aboard Norwegian Bliss)
  • -All meals aboard Norwegian Bliss sailing including 6 Group Dinners onboard cruise ship & Farewell Dinner in Los Angeles
  • -Hot buffet breakfast during pre and post-cruise hotel stays

  • -Half day guided tour in Los Angeles
  • -Optional dining in ship’s specialty restaurants (e.g. Japanese, French, Teppanyaki themes; extra charge)
  • -All entertainment aboard the Bliss including Second City Comedy Group and Broadway style shows
  • -Hotel to pier, pier to hotel & hotel to airport transfers included
  • -Baggage handling at hotels in Miami and LA, as well as at cruise ship terminals
  • -Services of an experienced Tour Director

tours.name: 12 Day Icebergs & Whales Newfoundland Discovery Tour ~ July 5 – 16, 2019
tours.summary: Another great “no-fly” getaway to the beautiful, breathtaking Newfoundland! This motorcoach tour will take you to some of the most natural and historical points in Canada. Come with us and explore Signal Hill, Cape Spear National Historic Area, Gros Morne National Park a UNESCO World Historic Site, Port Aux Choix Historic Area, L’Anse aux Meadows World Historic Site (Viking settlement), The Matthew II Replica and more! Highlights of our tour include the sightseeing cruise in Twillingate, or better known as 'iceberg Alley.'
tours.summaryy: Inclusions -Premium roundtrip motorcoach transportation -Ticket for all ferry crossings -Private sleeper cabin for Nova Scotia-Newfoundland ferry crossings (North Sydney to Argentia and Port Aux Basques to North Sydney) -11 nights hotel accommodations, Including: 2N aboard Marine Atlantic Ferry,

tours.name: 4 Day Cape Breton Celtic Colours Tour - October 15 – 18, 2019
tours.summary: Join us this October as we embark on the ruggedly beautiful Cabot Trail. Dinner is on us all three nights this year and all your breakfasts are included! Stay at the renowned seaside Keltic
tours.summaryy: -Return deluxe motor coach  transportation from the Maritimes -3 nights deluxe accommodations, including: 1N Baddeck, NS at the Inverary Resort
